thread.title: 3 men shot dead while watching Boks game in Gugulethu
thread.title_full: 3 men shot dead while watching Boks game in Gugulethu | News24

author: news24.com
title: 3 men shot dead while watching Boks game in Gugulethu
text:
Cape Town â€“ Three men were shot and killed while watching the Springboks game on Saturday evening at a Gugulethu tavern, police have confirmed.
The men, aged between 24 and 30, were shot dead in Cubungu Street, KTC, around 17:00, said Western Cape police spokesperson Constable Noloyiso Rwexana.
Local ward councillor Khaya Yozi said on Sunday that one of the men who died was an ANC branch leader.
While police said four men were wounded, Yozi put the figure at five.
